page.title: 05FARMLAND
page.content: The land is ploughed, sown and fertilized grassland used for pasture,hay, grass and silage. A very small amount of Barley (100 ACRES) Rape (60 acres) and Swedes (45 acres) are grown for cattle and sheep feed. 7,100 Clun, Mule and Beulah crossed breeding Ewes produce 8,800 fat lambs which are sold between July and December averaging Â£2 per kilo live weight. 470 Welsh Black and Hereford Cross cows crossed with Charalois Bulls produce 470 fat cattle which are sold all through the year for approximately Â£l per kilo live weight.
